statements: SELECT * FROM government_spending
SELECT department_name, amount, expense_type FROM government_spending WHERE amount > 10000
SELECT department_name, date FROM government_spending WHERE expense_type = 'salary'
SELECT * FROM government_spending ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT department_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spending FROM government_spending GROUP BY department_name
SELECT * FROM government_spending WHERE department_name = 'Education' ORDER BY amount DESC, date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT department_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM government_spending GROUP BY department_name HAVING total_amount > 50000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT expense_type, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM government_spending WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY expense_type ORDER BY average_amount DESC
SELECT department_name, expense_type, amount FROM government_spending WHERE amount > 100000 AND expense_type = 'Salary' ORDER BY department_name ASC, amount DESC
SELECT department_name, date, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM government_spending WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY department_name, date ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM government_spending;
SELECT department, amount FROM government_spending WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT id, department, amount FROM government_spending WHERE department = 'Health';
SELECT total_budget, year FROM budget_planning ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM government_spending WHERE amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT id, department, amount FROM government_spending WHERE department='Health' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, department, amount FROM government_spending WHERE amount > 1000000 AND department='Education' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, department, amount FROM government_spending WHERE amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY department ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT id, department, amount FROM government_spending WHERE department='Defense' ORDER BY department ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT id, department, amount FROM government_spending WHERE department='Transportation' ORDER BY amount ASC, department DESC;
SELECT * FROM government_spending_data;
SELECT department_name, expenditure_amount FROM government_spending_data WHERE expenditure_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM budget_planning ORDER BY budget_year DESC;
SELECT department_name, budget_amount FROM budget_planning WHERE budget_amount < 5000;
SELECT user_id, analysis_date FROM analysis_logs ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT department_name, expenditure_amount FROM government_spending_data WHERE expenditure_amount > 10000 ORDER BY expenditure_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT department_name, budget_amount, budget_year FROM budget_planning WHERE budget_year = 2022 ORDER BY department_name ASC, budget_amount DESC;
SELECT id, analysis_date, user_id FROM analysis_logs WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM government_spending_data WHERE department_name LIKE 'Health%' AND expenditure_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000;
SELECT department_name, budget_amount FROM budget_planning WHERE budget_amount > 50000 AND department_name IN ('Education', 'Infrastructure') ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM government_departments;
SELECT agency_name, department_id FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_id = 1;
SELECT category_name, amount, date FROM spending_records WHERE category_id = 2 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM government_departments WHERE department_name LIKE '%Public%';

SELECT r.amount, s.category_name, a.agency_name FROM spending_records r JOIN spending_categories s ON r.category_id = s.category_id JOIN government_agencies a ON r.agency_id = a.agency_id WHERE r.amount > 1000 AND a.department_id = 3 ORDER BY r.amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM government_departments WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT agency_name, department_name FROM government_agencies JOIN government_departments ON government_agencies.department_id = government_departments.department_id;
SELECT record_id, amount, date, category_name FROM spending_records JOIN spending_categories ON spending_records.category_id = spending_categories.category_id;

SELECT department_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spending FROM government_departments JOIN government_agencies ON government_departments.department_id = government_agencies.department_id JOIN spending_records ON government_agencies.agency_id = spending_records.agency_id GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT agency_name, AVG(amount) AS avg_spending FROM government_agencies JOIN spending_records ON government_agencies.agency_id = spending_records.agency_id GROUP BY agency_name;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, total_budget FROM government_agencies;
SELECT category_name, description FROM budget_categories;
SELECT expenditure, spending_date FROM spending_records;
SELECT analyst_name, email FROM analysts;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies
SELECT agency_name, total_budget FROM government_agencies WHERE total_budget > 100000
SELECT * FROM budget_categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'Education%'
SELECT analyst_name, email FROM analysts ORDER BY analyst_id DESC
SELECT plan_description, planned_budget FROM budget_plans WHERE planned_budget < 50000 ORDER BY planned_budget
